feats.name: Dangerous Sorcery
feats.description: Your innate magic is unusually destructive. When you Cast a Spell from your spell slots that deals damage and doesn't have a duration, you gain a status bonus to that spell's damage equal to the spell's level.

feats.name: Reach Spell
feats.description: You can extend the range of your spells. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spell's range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet.

feats.name: Ancestral Longevity
feats.description: You've accumulated a vast array of experiences. You gain the trained proficiency rank in one skill of your choice. At 3rd level, 7th level, and 15th level, you gain another trained proficiency in a skill of your choice.

inventory.name: Spellbook
inventory.description: Contains various notes and arcane theories

inventory.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
inventory.description: 3 charges per day, casts magic missiles at 1st level

inventory.name: Adventurer's Pack
inventory.description: Includes backpack, bedroll, 10 pieces of chalk, flint and steel, 50 feet of rope, 2 weeks' rations, soap, 5 torches, and a waterskin

notes.title: Imperial Lineage Research
notes.content: Visited the Grand Library of Taldor to research more about my imperial bloodline. The librarian mentioned a collection of ancient texts detailing the rise and fall of the first Taldan emperors. Need to gain higher access privileges to view these restricted archives.

notes.title: Arcane Breakthrough
notes.content: While practicing the manipulation of fire magic, I discovered a technique to make the flames burn with a distinctive blue-white color. The heat seems more intense, but the effect requires precise control of my innate energies. Must experiment further to refine this.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

spells.name: Electric Arc
spells.description: An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. You deal 1d4+4 electricity damage to the target creatures. The targets must attempt a basic Reflex save. The electricity damage increases to 2d4+4 at 3rd level, 3d4+4 at 5th level, 4d4+4 at 7th level, and so on.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.description: The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose any one of four options: cook, lift, clean, or color.

spells.name: Shield
spells.duration: Until the start of your next turn
spells.description: You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use. While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magical shield.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.description: Gouts of flame rush from your hands. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area. The creatures must attempt a basic Reflex save.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, you can fire an additional missile at the same or a different target.

heightened.+2: You fire one additional missile with each action you spend.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.duration: Until the next time you make your daily preparations
spells.description: You ward yourself with magical energy. You gain a +1 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. While wearing mage armor, you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.

heightened.4th: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5.
heightened.6th: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC, a maximum Dexterity modifier of +6, and a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
heightened.8th: You gain a +3 item bonus to AC, a maximum Dexterity modifier of +6, and a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

spells.name: True Strike
spells.duration: Until the end of your turn
spells.description: A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.description: You fire a ray of heat and flame. Make a spell attack roll. On a success, you deal 4d6 fire damage. On a critical success, you deal double damage.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Three illusory duplicates of you swirl around your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you. These images move with you and disappear one at a time when a foe succeeds at attacking one of them. The images have AC 10 + your Dexterity modifier. Strikes that would miss you but would hit AC 10 + your Dexterity modifier hit and destroy a duplicate instead.

spells.name: Haste
spells.description: Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

heightened.7th: You can target up to 6 creatures.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: A roaring ball of fire explodes, dealing 6d6 fire damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Reflex save.

bloodline.name: Imperial
bloodline.description: The blood of dragons or other powerful reptilian creatures runs through your veins. The inheritors of this bloodline are often ambitious and proud, with a tendency toward imperiousness and a sense of superiority.

focus_spells.name: Dragon Claws
focus_spells.description: Vicious claws grow from your fingers. They are finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d4 slashing damage and 1d4 fire damage. You're trained with them, or expert if you're a master in the spell's tradition. While the spell is active, your hands are transformed and can't be used for manipulate actions that require fingers, such as casting spells with somatic components, using most weapons, or using hand-to-manipulate abilities such as Disable Device.

heightened.4th: The slashing damage increases to 2d4 and the fire damage increases to 2d4.
heightened.6th: The slashing damage increases to 3d4 and the fire damage increases to 3d4.
heightened.8th: The slashing damage increases to 4d4 and the fire damage increases to 4d4.

focus_spells.name: Dragon Breath
focus_spells.description: You spew energy from your mouth in a powerful blast. You deal 5d6 fire damage to creatures in the area. Each creature must attempt a basic Reflex save.
